name: Markeng
body:
### Welcome to Markeng.
Markeng is a tool to engineer the front-end. It allows to develop HTML pages in a more structured way.

### Why did I develop it?
Being a developer of front-end myself, I was always frustrated by lack of structure. By the time a project is ready to deliver, we would have got a few big HTML, CSS and JS files. Maintenance was a nightmare, because we could never figure out where the Markup, and other assets were for a particular section.
We at [Openly|http://openly.co] put a massive effort to improve the standards using LESS, building modular JavaScript, Using build tools such as RequireJS and Grunt etc. They defnitely improved the front-end quality, but we were not convinced still that it was sufficient.

### Installation
```
npm install -g markeng
```
### Usage
Markeng splits up contents in pages and components.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
